description: Sample D&D campaigns for testing and demonstration

campaigns.name: The Lost Mines of Phandelver
campaigns.description: A classic adventure for new players and DMs. Set in the Sword Coast region of the Forgotten Realms, this adventure takes characters from level 1 to 5 as they investigate the disappearance of a dwarf named Gundren Rockseeker.

campaigns.name: Curse of Strahd
campaigns.description: A gothic horror adventure in the land of Barovia. The characters are trapped in a realm ruled by the vampire lord Strahd von Zarovich, and must find a way to escape while confronting the darkness within.

campaigns.name: Tomb of Annihilation
campaigns.description: Adventure in the steaming jungles of Chult to find the cause of a death curse that is affecting the entire world. Explore ancient ruins and face deadly traps in this challenging adventure.

campaigns.name: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist
campaigns.description: A caper adventure set in the city of Waterdeep. The characters become embroiled in a conspiracy involving missing gold and must navigate the politics and dangers of the City of Splendors.

campaigns.name: Custom Homebrew Campaign
campaigns.description: A completely custom campaign set in a homebrew world where magic has recently returned after being absent for centuries.
